about_the_game: The Vertical Slice of Forge of the Fae offers around 1 hour of playable content in near to final quality. Certain features are not included.
detailed_description: The Vertical Slice of Forge of the Fae offers around 1 hour of playable content in near to final quality. Certain features are not included.

name: Forge of the Fae Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: any quad core or more recent processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX700 series or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: The Vertical Slice of Forge of the Fae offers around 1 hour of playable content in near to final quality. Certain features are not included. Enemies are not constantly shown on the otherworld for example.
